page.title: 09Stewarts Saturday
page.content: I get up at quarter past seven. I watch TV while Mum makes my breakfast and I get myself dressed. Then I go down to Inveraray with Kevin the lodger and Colin my brother. We buy some sweets and I get a commando book, then we go home. I take my pet rabbit,Miss Bun out for a run.I put Bun in her hutch then I feed Bun "Bunny Brunch"(rabbit food) and some lettuce.I tell Kevin and Colin to play football.I got five goals and Colin got four and Kevin was the goalie.I have my tea and read a book.My favourite book is Asterisk. Kevin takes Colin and me out for dinner at the hotel.We got back home in the car.We all watch the film on TV.We play monopoly or Colins computer.I eat some cornflakes then I go to the toilet and then go to my bed.
